# Tender Announcement - Rehabilitation Services for Aboriginal Offenders

## Solicitation Number

* Solicitation Number: 21301-25-4682493
* Publication Date: April 30, 2024
* Tender Closing Date: May 15, 2024

## Procurement Objectives

The Correctional Service Canada (CSC) requires a contractor to provide culturally appropriate rehabilitation services for Aboriginal offenders. The objective is to strengthen culturally adapted services during the transition period and foster collaboration between rural and remote Aboriginal communities and the half-way house to support the transition and reintegration of offenders into their home communities.

## Scope of Work

The contractor must provide the following services:

1. Therapeutic cultural art workshops to the Aboriginal population under supervision in the Amos area to support the reintegration of Aboriginal offenders.
2. Culturally adapted products for traditional ceremonies and activities.
3. Collaborate and develop partnerships with Aboriginal communities to provide culturally significant services directly to the population in transition in the Abitibi-Témiscamingue region.

## Deliverables

* A monthly activity report detailing the calendar of activities and meetings with external partners.
* A report of achievements and activities carried out during the year as well as a self-evaluation of the project.

## Key Requirements

* The contractor must have at least three years of experience in the six years prior to the closing date with the traditions, political, and community customs of Aboriginal people from Algonquin, Cree, and Inuit Nations and their governance and protocols.
* The contractor must have an established network of Aboriginal community resources and provide services to Aboriginal offenders by being accredited according to the tripartite compliance standards.

## Tender Evaluation Criteria

The evaluation will be based on the statement of capabilities submitted by the contractor, which must demonstrate how they meet the advertised requirements.

## Contract Details

* Contract duration: One year, with an option to extend for two additional one-year periods.
* Estimated value: $119,999.88 (GST/HST extra).

## Contact Information

* Contact Person: Eloïse Clément-Ferland
* Contact Email: eloise.clement@csc-scc.gc.ca
* Contact Phone: (514) 234-6283
